data.text: O! Mawu, tsɔ wò afia nyui tsotso do na fia la,
Adrɔ̃ ʋɔnu na wò dukɔ la le dzɔdzɔenyenye me,
Towo atsɔ kesinɔnuwo vɛ na wò dukɔ,
Aʋli ame siwo ƒe dzi gbã la ta,
Zi ale si ɣe kple ɣleti li la,
Anɔ abe tsidzadza ɖe anyigba si dzi woƒo gbe le
Ame dzɔdzɔewo ayi ŋgɔ le eƒe ɣeyiɣiwo me,
Aɖu fia tso atsiaƒu ƒe go sia dzi ayi go kemɛ dzi,
Dukɔ siwo le gbegbe la ade ta agu nɛ,
Tarsis fia kple didiƒe ƒutatɔwo ahe adzɔ vɛ nɛ,
Fiawo katã ade ta agu nɛ,
elabena aɖe hiãtɔ si le avi fam
Akpɔ nublanui na ame gblɔewo kple hiãtɔwo,
Aɖe wo le teteɖeanyi kple ŋutasesẽ me,
Fia la nenɔ agbe tegbee!
Bli nedo agbogbo ɖe anyigba la katã dzi;
Eƒe ŋkɔ nenɔ anyi ɖaa,
Woakafu Yehowa Mawu,
Woakafu eƒe ŋkɔ si ŋu ŋutikɔkɔe
Esiawo wu Yese ƒe vi, David ƒe gbedodoɖawo nu.
